  • Constructor Details

    • FoxHead

      public FoxHead​(Coordinate coord, FoxDirection direction)
      Constructor which also creates its related tail.
      Parameters:
      coord - Coordinate object with the position in which the fox's head is initially.
      direction - The direction the fox is facing.

  • Method Details

    • getTail

      public FoxTail getTail()
      Returns FoxTail object related to this head.
      Returns:
      Reference to the tail object, like a FoxTail, no Fox.

    • move

      public boolean move​(Coordinate destination, Level level)
      Description copied from interface: Movable
      Moves the piece from the move's starting coordinate to the move's ending coordinate according to the game's rules.
      Parameters:
      destination - The object representing the destination coordinate of the movable piece.
      level - The level on which this move is taking place.
      Returns:
      true if the move was successful, false if parameters are invalid or the move was unsuccessful.

    • isValidMove

      public boolean isValidMove​(Coordinate destination, Level level)
      In this case, this method moves the head and tail of the fox.
      Parameters:
      destination - The object representing the destination coordinate of the movable piece.
      level - The level on which this move is taking place.
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid, false if parameters are invalid or the move is invalid. It also returns "false" if there doesn't exist a reference to the head.

    • isValidHorizontalMove

      private boolean isValidHorizontalMove​(Move move, Level level)
      Checks if the move is valid horizontally according to the game's rules.
      Parameters:
      move - Movement that the fox's head wants to do.
      level - Level object of the current level.
      Returns:
      True if the horizontal move is correct. Otherwise, false.

    • calculateHorizontalCondition

      private boolean calculateHorizontalCondition​(int distance, int i, int end)
      Helper method for "isValidHorizontalMove".
      Parameters:
      distance - Distance/Subtraction between move's ending column coordinate and move's starting column coordinate.
      i - Current index of the loop.
      end - Ending index of the loop.
      Returns:
      True if it's possible to move the fox to "i" cell. Otherwise, false.

    • isValidVerticalMove

      private boolean isValidVerticalMove​(Move move, Level level)
      Checks if the move is valid vertically according to the game's rules.
      Parameters:
      move - Movement that the fox's head wants to do.
      level - Level object of the current level.
      Returns:
      True if the vertical move is correct. Otherwise, false.

    • calculateVerticalCondition

      private boolean calculateVerticalCondition​(int distance, int i, int end)
      Helper method for "isValidVerticalMove".
      Parameters:
      distance - Distance/Subtraction between move's ending row coordinate and move's starting row coordinate.
      i - Current index of the loop.
      end - Ending index of the loop.
      Returns:
      True if it's possible to move the fox to "i" cell. Otherwise, false.
